posts.post_content:
a) Product Features:

Product: Luxury Scented Candle with Cork Lid
Material: soy wax
Packaging: Glass
Content: Single piece
Fragrance: Coconut
Quantity: 210 gm
Size :  7.3 X 8.0 X 9.0 cms
Burn time: 38-40hrs 
Wick: Lead free cotton wick
b) FAQs: 

What is Soy Wax?
Paraffin free wax made from Soybean.

Is the wick eco-friendly?
Yes, the candle wick is eco-friendly and made from lead-free cotton.

Is it available in packs?
Yes, you can also buy these coconut shell candles in a pack of two and four.

What benefits does it have in comparison to plastic candles?
These coconut shell candles are biodegradable, free of BPA and synthetics, and handcrafted. In other words, these candles are eco-friendly, whereas plastic ones damage the earth's ecosystem. 

Are coconut wax candles safe?
Yes, they are safe.

Which fragrance options are available?
These eco-friendly candles are available in three lovely fragrance of lavender, Japanese cherry blossom, and coconut.

What is the burn time of this candle?
The coconut shell has 100 gms soy wax, which lasts anywhere from 20hrs to 35hrs.
***

#ONEarth Basics: Why must waste coconut shells be upcycled?

Waste coconut shells are burnt in large numbers in South India, primarily because the smoke drives away the mosquitoes. Also, it's a quick way to get rid of them. However, this releases methane and CO2 in the atmosphere. Methane is 80x worse than CO2 when it comes to global warming in the short run. In the long run, it is still about 25x worse.

Wish to read more about coconut shells/coir? Read here.

Eau De Parfum | earth Overview

If dressing up in earthiness and always carrying a warm heart up your sleeve is your best trait, we've got you a fragrance to complement your aura.
Eau De Parfum earth is an intoxicating concoction of warm, spicy and earthy notes that wrap you in a sophisticated vibe. It is perfect for a gentleman who is all about staying grounded while letting his hard work make the noise for him.
At the first spray, welcome the warmth of Tobacco, followed by the spiciness of Cinnamon, and what lingers on you for the longest is a scent of an unfiltered earthiness.



HOW TO USE?

Step 2: Neck region


Step 3: Both wrists

Long-lasting freshness:
EAU De Parfum earth by The Man Company draws its inspiration from the celestial world and has high-quality essential oils that make it long-lasting. It will keep you grounded yet uplifted all day long.
Perfect for everyday use: The Man Company’s EDP earth is an everyday fragrance for the modern-day gentleman who is grounded at heart and warms up the hearts of those around him with his aura.
Warm, spicy & earthy: Our Eau De Parfum earth has delightful notes that keep you feeling heavenly. At the top lies the warm tobacco, followed by spicy Cinnamon at the middle, and at the base lies a unique earthiness. 
FAQs

A: Absolutely! Earth’s unique long-lasting freshness makes it perfect to use as a signature fragrance.
Q: Is this good for a special occasion?
A: EDP earth is a perfect fit for everyday use and all special occasions in your life.
Q: Which personality does this fragrance fit?
A: If you carry an unmatched warmth and are all about staying grounded, the earth is the fragrance for you.
Q: Will the fragrance stay with me all day long?
A: Without a doubt! Our EDP earth is made using rich essential oils and will linger on you all day long.
Q: Should I spray it on my body or clothes?
A: Always spray a fragrance on your body instead of your clothes to make it last longer.

We believe the festive season is all about uplifting your manly spirit. Unbox Manly Fragrances and get ready for all the fun. 




 
What’s In the Combo?


 Intense EDP Details 



We’ve taken our time to revel in a range of natural ingredients and formulate our Eau De Parfum Intense. An Oriental fragrance with unmatched warm and musky top notes blended beautifully with lavender’s exotic sweetness and lemon’s citrusy freshness. It holds to its core a distinct spicy-sweet blend of patchouli, coffee accord, and plum. What lasts and reverberates, in the end, is a subtle base note of rich and woody amber wood perfected with a sweet and sultry touch of vanilla.
Fragrance Notes:
Top Note: Oriental
A fragrance that opens with an oriental note is supposed to freshen up your mind, body and soul.
Middle Note: Patchouli
Due to its presence in the heart note patchouli adds to your scent an earthy and herbaceous vibe.
Base Note: Vanilla
Vanilla’s reputation as a powerful aphrodisiac endures, and it’s often present in alluring fragrances.
     2. EDP Musk Details
As an accompaniment to the lasting essence of a gentleman who carries his warmth and style as his second skin, we announce Musk. Dressed in lemon, basil leaf, eucalyptus and lavandin, the top blend announces your essence with a fresh citrusy charm. The middle notes follow your footsteps with a spicy tone of marine, cedarwood and peppermint, leaving a pleasant scent wafting about you. Finally the lasting bit of musk stands true to its name and goes about exuding a musky aroma topped with an intoxicating touch of vanilla.
Fragrance Notes:
Top Note: Lemon
Lemon makes for a sparkling top note that is zesty and cheerful to keep your spirit high and uplifted.
Middle Note: Marine
If your fragrance has notes of marine, it means that it beautifully captures the essence of fresh sea air and the shore at its heart.
Base Note: Musk
As a base note, musk is known to linger onto you even after the aromatic transition of your fragrance.
    3. EDP Oud Details
Oud is a carefully crafted scent for the gentleman who flows by his days exuding an aura of perfection.
Our EDP Oud is a mystery blend of essential oils. It is decorated with top notes of fresh citruses and whisky. It settles for you with the earthy notes of coriander, creating a suave balance along with the spiciness of cinnamon and pepper. The resting and relaxing base notes of Oud are woody with a sweet powdery warmth that exhibits sweet and spicy qualities of patchouli befriending the exotic essence of vanilla.
Top Note: Whisky
Fragrances laced with a complex note like whisky are known to be very warm, sophisticated and deep.
Middle Note: Coriander
Coriander when put in the heart note of your fragrance ensures a suave and spicy character while making sure it does not overpower your senses. 
Base Note: Patchouli
As an ingredient, patchouli is known to act as an excellent fixative that extends the life of your perfume.
